attributes.action: Approach the South African government to urge them to stop the barbaric shooting of lions - known as 'Canned Shooting'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At this very moment in time, thousands of lions are being bred in South Africa to be shot as 'trophies' by rich business men, who clearly have an ego the size of their bank balance!

These defenseless animals stand no chance, as they are often drugged and cornered in small fenced camps, with no means of escape.

This must stop. The South African government have known about canned shooting for many years, yet no action, policies or regulations to outlaw this have been forthcoming, despite there being a widespread call for it to be banned.

Please help to save these majestic animals from a life of mysery, and ultimate death!
